loggers

Class ManualLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • loggers.ManualLogger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptanceLogger, PenaltiesLogger

    public abstract class ManualLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    ManualLogger is an abstract class implementing all common methods required for the logging system. All loggers should extend this class.
    Since:
    0.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joeri Ruyssinck (joeri.ruysssinck@intec.ugent.be)

      Constructs a new Manuallogger (abstract class, cannot be called directly)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManualLogger

        public ManualLogger(int loggingInterval,
                    java.lang.String logFile,
                    java.io.File outputDir)
        Constructs a new Manuallogger (abstract class, cannot be called directly)
        Parameters:
        loggingInterval - perform logging action every 'loggingInterval' changes to the network
        logFile - name of output file
        outputDir - name/path of the output directory
